scripts.release: npm run release:prepare && npm run release:push && changeset publish
scripts.release:check: test $(git branch --show-current) != 'master' && echo 'Switch to master branch, please.' && exit 1 || test "`git status . --porcelain`" && echo 'Uncommitted changes found. Aborting release.' && exit 1 || exit 0
scripts.release:push: git add . && git commit -m 'Publish' && changeset tag && git push --follow-tags
